title: ELISA SANNA
subtitle: The Art of Italian Craftsmanship
description: Welcome to a world where tradition meets innovation, where every stitch tells a story of passion and excellence.

title: Couture e Cerimonia
description: Curated looks for special occasions and refined experiences

title: Our Craftsmanship and Values
description: Curated looks for women with our artisans

title: Our Journey
description: Discover the story behind each creation through our craftsmanship journey

title: Be Inspired With Our Latest Pieces
description: Discover the fashion that expresses different life goals, stories of style, handcrafted with care, designed to inspire.

title: 01. DESIGN & CONCEPTION
description: Every creation begins with a spark of inspiration. Our designers carefully study fashion trends, client preferences, and artistic vision to create unique concepts that blend tradition with modernity.

title: 02. MATERIAL SELECTION
description: We source the finest fabrics from renowned Italian mills, selecting each material for its quality, texture, and ability to bring our designs to life. Only the best materials meet our standards.

title: 03. HANDCRAFT & EMBROIDERY
description: Our master artisans bring each piece to life through meticulous handwork. Every stitch, every embroidered detail, and every finish is crafted with the precision of generations of Italian craftsmanship.

title: 04. FINAL CREATION
description: After careful attention to every detail, our creations are born. Each piece represents not just a garment, but a story of passion, tradition, and the pursuit of perfection that defines Elisa Sanna.

title: COLLECTION
description: A bold statement piece that embodies confidence and elegance for the modern woman.

title: READY-TO-WEAR
description: Effortless sophistication meets contemporary design in this versatile ensemble.

title: ELISA SANNA
subtitle: MADE TO MEASURE
description: Made to Measure is our solution to ethical elegance crafted especially for you.

title: MADE TO MEASURE
description: Made to Measure is our solution to ethical elegance crafted especially for you. Collaborate with our artisans to choose the finest fabrics and fits, creating your own design.

title: Precision
description: A beautifully tailored custom garment created from a thoughtful assessment to perfectly reflect the client's measurements and personal preferences.

title: Fit and Design
description: Made-to-measure provides a refined fit that surpasses off-the-rack options, ensuring a tailored silhouette that flatters your measurements and preferences.

title: Exclusive
description: Made-to-measure reflects perfect balance between personalization and efficiency, delivering a unique garment alongside your needs in mind.

title: First step - Book an appointment
description: Whether you are in Milano or overseas, schedule your appointment with our specialists. Bookings can be made through telephone, online, or in person at our atelier.

title: Second step - Measurements
description: We take precise measurements for each individual client through an extensive process with attention to detail. Aesthetic aspects such as silhouette, design and style are thoroughly discussed.

title: Third step - Fitting
description: The second meeting is scheduled 4 weeks after the first. During this meeting a primary fitting is conducted on the garment, alterations are made and the fit is refined.

title: Fourth step - Collection
description: The piece is ready to be collected in store, perfectly tailored to your measurements and preferences.

title: Appointment at your home
description: We offer a home fitting service for our existing clients. For new clients, we recommend visiting our atelier for the initial consultation.

title: Virtual appointment
description: Book a virtual appointment with our team to discuss your requirements and get expert advice on our made-to-measure services.

title: Appointment in our Atelier
description: Visit our atelier in Milano for a complete consultation experience. Our team will guide you through the entire process.

title: ELISA SANNA
subtitle: PERSONALIZED FOR YOU
description: Transform your style dreams into reality with our personalized design service.

title: PERSONALISED FOR YOU
description: Made to Measure is not intended to replace custom tailoring for you. Collaborate with our artisans to choose the finest fabrics and styles every detail. Each design is tailored to your personal style, bringing Italian craftsmanship with modern sophistication.

title: Precision
description: A beautifully tailored custom garment is created from a thoughtful design process, perfectly crafted to the client's measurements and personal preferences.

title: Fit and Design
description: Made to measure starts with an existing base pattern that is modified to fit the client. Options like fabric, style and other design elements are available, but the structure of the garment remains largely pre-determined.

title: Exclusivity
description: Made to measure provides a personal fit and variation in fabrics, options, offering a unique garment designed with your needs in mind.

title: First step: Appointment
description: Schedule them to Mauro's specialist by appointment only. Please note that fittings can be made without immediate attention of placing an order.

title: Second step: Measurement & Consultation
description: The unique silhouette designed for each individual client is created through an advanced measurement process with an extensive attention to detail. A specific silhouette such as sleeve, design and style are thoroughly discussed.

title: Third step: Fitting
description: The garment is scheduled if needed for the first meeting. During the second meeting a thorough fitting is conducted on the garment ordered. Alterations are made and the fit is perfected.

title: Finishing: Collection
description: The piece is ready to be collected in store.

title: Appointment at your convenience
description: We would love to help you find the perfect fit. Please contact us to schedule an appointment at your convenience. We look forward to working with you.

title: Virtual Appointment
description: Schedule a virtual appointment with our expert tailors. We'll guide you through the measurement process and fabric selection from the comfort of your home.

title: Appointment in our Atelier
description: Visit our atelier for a complete bespoke experience. Our master tailors will provide personalized consultation and precise measurements in our luxury showroom.

title: HAND EMBROIDERY
subtitle: The Art of Italian Needlework
description: Discover the ancient art of hand embroidery, where every thread tells a story of tradition and mastery.

title: The Art of Hand Embroidery
subtitle: Preserving Ancient Traditions
description: Hand embroidery represents the pinnacle of Italian craftsmanship, where skilled artisans transform simple threads into works of art. Each piece tells a story of dedication, precision, and the timeless beauty of handmade creation.

title: THE DESIGNER
subtitle: Elisa Sanna
description: Meet the visionary behind our timeless creations.

title: About Elisa Sanna
description: Elisa Sanna is a renowned Italian fashion designer whose passion for craftsmanship and attention to detail have made her a respected name in luxury fashion. Her designs blend traditional Italian techniques with contemporary aesthetics.

title: OUR ATELIER
subtitle: Where Craftsmanship Lives
description: Step into our world of Italian artistry and traditional craftsmanship.

title: The Heart of Creation
description: Our atelier is where passion meets precision, where traditional Italian craftsmanship techniques are honored and preserved. Here, master artisans dedicate their expertise to creating pieces of exceptional quality and beauty.

title: ELISA SANNA
subtitle: CRAFTSMANSHIP & VALUES
description: The heart of our brand lies in the timeless tradition of Italian craftsmanship and unwavering commitment to excellence

title: Craftsmanship and Values
description: At Elisa Sanna, we believe that true luxury is born from the marriage of traditional techniques and passionate artistry. Every piece we create is a testament to the values that define us: authenticity, quality, sustainability, and respect for the artisans who pour their soul into every stitch.
Our craftsmen are the guardians of centuries-old techniques
image_url: passed down through generations of Italian artisans. Each garment is meticulously constructed by hand
image_alt: with every detail receiving the attention it deserves.

description: We source only the finest materials from trusted Italian suppliers who share our commitment to excellence. Premium fabrics
image_alt: and traditional tools come together in our atelier to create pieces that transcend fashion trends.

description: Our values of sustainability and ethical production are woven into every aspect of our process. We believe that true luxury means creating responsibly
image_url: honoring both our artisans and our planet with every creation that bears the Elisa Sanna name.

title: ELISA SANNA
subtitle: OUR ATELIER
description: Faithful to the Italian origins of the brand
image_url: our Atelier and team pays tribute to craftsmanship

title: Our Atelier
description: In fashion, we embrace slowness?choosing quality over quantity, and timeless design over fleeting trends. Sustainability means crafting pieces with care, sourcing responsibly, and honoring the planet with every stitch.
We believe in building garments through deep research?with those who share our values
image_alt: and our future. Understanding how our manufacturers work is not just important and essential to us.

description: We are proud to partner with master artisans who embody the spirit of Italian excellence. Their expertise
image_alt: brings our vision to life with every stitch and detail.

description: Elisa Sanna is more than a brand. It's a family bound by respect
image_alt: and a commitment to timeless Italian craftsmanship.

title: ELISA SANNA
subtitle: HAND EMBROIDERY
description: Discover the ancient art of hand embroidery, where every thread tells a story of tradition and mastery.

title: HAND EMBROIDERY
description: Hand embroidery is the art of decorating fabric using a needle and thread. Unlike machine embroidery, it's entirely done by hand allowing for a personal touch, intricate details, and endless creative possibilities.

title: prova booo
description: salta la quaglia Conceptualization: Begin with a theme or inspiration. Sketching: Create a design on paper or digitally. Customization: Tailor the design to suit the fabric, purpose, and personal style.
